flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
A move that causes
confusion.

A move that causes
confusion.

A sinister ray that
confuses the foe.

A sinister ray that
confuses the foe.

The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

Un rayon sinistre qui plonge l’ennemi
dans un état de confusion.

The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

あやしい　ひかりを
あいてに　みせて　まどわせる。
あいてを　こんらん　させる。

이상한 빛을
상대에게 비춰 당황하게 한다.
상대를 혼란시킨다.

Un rayon sinistre qui plonge l’ennemi dans un état
de confusion.
Ein fieser Strahl, der das Ziel verwirrt.
Rayo siniestro que confunde al objetivo.

Colpisce il bersaglio con un raggio funesto
che lo confonde.

The target is exposed to a sinister
ray that triggers confusion.

怪しい　光を
相手に　みせて　まどわせる。
相手を　混乱させる。
